tasks.title: Nightly Audio 20 Variants
tasks.description: Create 10 nightly + 10 morning audio transcript variants (~5 min each)

tasks.title: Dashboard GitHub Deploy Automation
tasks.description: Auto-deploy built into subagent protocol + task poller handles all dashboard deploys

tasks.title: Dashboard Enhancement v2
tasks.description: Nav bar, fitness integration, vertical layout, unified data, live rendering, assignee dropdowns, notes, review checkbox, task poller

tasks.title: Nightly Pipeline Reliability
tasks.description: sync_data.sh timeouts added, duplicate Garmin sync removed, watchdog cron active

tasks.title: WHOOP Day Strain Bug
tasks.description: Fixed: report was summing workout strains instead of using cycle day strain

tasks.description: Fixed Speediance loader, recovery key mismatch, added lifting strain

tasks.title: Dashboard v1 Build
tasks.description: 17 tasks: schemas, CSS, templates, renderers, server, deploy — all complete

tasks.title: Fitness Report Defect Fixes
tasks.description: Email sleep bug, telegram recovery data, historical report refs

tasks.title: Sage Dashboard QA Review
tasks.description: Reviewed all 17 dashboard deliverables, found 3 critical bugs

tasks.title: Dark Mode Theme Customizer
tasks.description: Add a theme customizer to adjust dashboard accent colors, font sizes, and dark mode intensity.

tasks.title: Agent Status Health Indicators
tasks.description: Add visual health indicators (CPU, memory, uptime) to agent status cards with real-time updates.

tasks.title: Fitness Data Heatmap Calendar
tasks.description: Integrate a heatmap calendar to visualize daily strain, sleep, and recovery trends over months.
tasks.notes: Fitness Data Heatmap Calendar Preview link is broken (this needs to actually work)

tasks.title: Automated Task Prioritization
tasks.description: Use agent workload and fitness data to auto-prioritize tasks based on user energy levels.

tasks.title: Voice-Controlled Dashboard Navigation
tasks.description: Enable voice commands for navigating the dashboard and triggering agent actions.

tasks.title: Agent Collaboration Mode
tasks.description: Enable agents to collaborate on tasks in real-time with shared context and progress tracking.

tasks.title: Fitness Goal Progress Widget
tasks.description: Add a widget to track progress toward weekly/monthly fitness goals (e.g., strain, sleep, recovery).

tasks.title: Automated Error Recovery for Agents
tasks.description: Implement self-healing mechanisms for agents to recover from crashes or timeouts automatically.

tasks.title: Customizable Dashboard Layouts
tasks.description: Allow users to save and switch between multiple dashboard layouts (e.g., fitness-focused, task-focused).

tasks.title: Real-Time Notification Center
tasks.description: Add a notification center to display real-time alerts for agent actions, fitness milestones, and task updates.

tasks.title: Sleep Quality Deep Dive
tasks.description: Add a detailed sleep analysis view with breakdowns of sleep stages, disturbances, and recovery impact.

tasks.title: Agent Performance Benchmarking
tasks.description: Add benchmarking tools to compare agent performance across tasks and optimize resource allocation.

tasks.title: Fitness Data Export API
tasks.description: Create an API to export fitness data (WHOOP, Garmin, 8Sleep) in standardized formats (JSON, CSV).

tasks.title: Dashboard Accessibility Audit
tasks.description: Conduct an accessibility audit and implement fixes for screen readers, keyboard navigation, and color contrast.

tasks.title: Automated Daily Briefing
tasks.description: Generate and deliver a daily briefing summarizing tasks, fitness data, and agent activity via voice or text.

tasks.title: Multi-Device Sync for Dashboard
tasks.description: Enable seamless sync of dashboard state and preferences across multiple devices.

tasks.title: Agent Task Time Estimates
tasks.description: Add estimated time-to-completion for tasks based on historical agent performance data.

tasks.title: Fitness Alerts for Overtraining
tasks.description: Implement alerts for overtraining risks based on strain, recovery, and sleep data.

tasks.title: Dashboard Plugin System
tasks.description: Create a plugin system to allow users to add custom widgets, data sources, and integrations.

tasks.title: Agent Workload Balancer
tasks.description: Dynamically redistribute tasks among agents based on current workload and performance metrics.

tasks.title: Historical Trend Charts
tasks.description: Add interactive charts to visualize long-term trends for fitness, productivity, and agent activity metrics.

tasks.title: Cronometer Nutrition Integration Widget
tasks.description: Integrate a widget to display real-time nutrition data (macros, calories, micronutrients) from Cronometer alongside fitness metrics.

tasks.title: Agent Chat/Log Viewer
tasks.description: Create a dedicated interface to view, search, and interact with agent conversations and logs for debugging and transparency.

tasks.title: Mobile-Responsive PWA
tasks.description: Optimize the dashboard for mobile devices, enable PWA installation, and ensure offline functionality for key features.

tasks.title: Webhook Integrations for External Triggers
tasks.description: Enable external services to trigger dashboard actions (e.g., task creation, fitness logging) via webhook endpoints.

tasks.title: Remove Titan from System
tasks.description: Remove Titan agent from SUBAGENTS.md, MEMORY.md, dashboard.json, kanban template, and gateway config.

tasks.title: Dashboard tasks
tasks.description: I want the checkbox on the Review step removed and replaced with a green approve button right above reject, I want to enter just the Description (remove optional) and the assignee generate the title if it is marked to do and if it is marked to approve put (to generate) so that no longer needs to be a field on the Kanban board, Assignees need to have their emoji in the dropdown, I want To Approve to have a button with to backlog and a seperate page linked at the top titled backlog which will show just all of those tasks.
